body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Bruce Rogers and the customer's name is Ashley Rodriguez.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Bruce Rogers, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm Ashley Rodriguez. I have some questions about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ashley! What specific information are you looking for regarding our motorcycles?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in learning about your latest models but also have a few concerns.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I'd be happy to help with that. Could you please provide me with your zip code, so I can tailor the information to your area?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven zero one two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that, Ashley! And can I also ask for your phone number for follow-up purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's three zero three eight six seven five four three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Now that I have your details, let me share the specifics about our latest models and address any concerns you might have.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds good. I'm excited to hear more!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Ashley! I really appreciate it. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
